channel.title: Openssh-sftp-server Package
channel.description:
Would you consider adding the openssh-sftp-server package? This package is useful for those of us who want to transfer and edit router configuration files using SFTP compatible tools/clients like Cyberduck.
The openssh-sftp-server package provides the SFTP server component of OpenSSH, and allows users to securely transfer files between their local machine and the router.
https://openwrt.org/docs/guide-user/services/nas/sftp.server https://openwrt.org/packages/pkgdata/openssh-sftp-server
Thanks!

item.title: Openssh-sftp-server Package
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
Will add in next release few days 0.99.9HF5.
Thanks

item.title: Openssh-sftp-server Package

item.description:
Would you consider adding the openssh-sftp-server package? This package is useful for those of us who want to transfer and edit router configuration files using SFTP compatible tools/clients like Cyberduck.

The openssh-sftp-server package provides the SFTP server component of OpenSSH, and allows users to securely transfer files between their local machine and the router.

OpenWrt Wiki – 2 Jan 14

SFTP server

SFTP server This article relies on the following: * Accessing web interface / command-line interface * Managing configs / packages / services / logs Introduction * This how-to describes the method for setting up SFTP server on OpenWrt. * ...
